summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the solid waste system of The City of Seattle; authorizing the issuance and sale of solid waste revenue refunding bonds for the purposes of paying the costs of refunding the City's outstanding solid waste revenue bonds, and providing a reserve for and paying the costs of issuing and selling those bonds; describing the terms, conditions, covenants, liens and manner of sale of those bonds; and creating certain funds and accounts of the City.
